ygData.subject: Re: Bellow and DDD/CoD (was  Early bard grouping (was Twinking))
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Melee range, or perhaps a bit more.  Very short, shorter than Hymn (or even with, I don t recall).  It s for this reason I prefer Chords or Denon s to
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> Does anyone have a good idea on how far the radius extends on DDD and CoD?

Melee range, or perhaps a bit more. Very short, shorter than Hymn (or
even with, I don't recall). It's for this reason I prefer Chords or
Denon's to bellow, as the overall damage inflicted is greater. It's not
as noticeable since you don't get the instant hit report, but there's
definitely more of it (especially if you swap in your lute between swings
;).

Athren Notechaser, bellow-impaired
